mapper.insert: insert into card(card_name, card_species, card_birth, card_mmti, card_img) values (#{card_name}, #{card_species}, #{card_birth}, #{card_mmti}, #{card_img})
mapper.update: update card set card_img = #{card_img}, card_mmti = #{card_mmti} where card_no = #{card_no}
mapper.select: select card_no, card_name, card_species, card_birth, card_mmti, card_img, card_date from card where card_no = #{card_no}
select card_no, card_name, card_species, card_birth, card_mmti, card_img, card_date from card
